thread.section_title: Hotel Wales - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: The suites are very nice and well-priced
thread.title_full: The suites are very nice and well-priced - Review of Hotel Wales, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Randi R
title: The suites are very nice and well-priced
text: My first time at Hotel Wales was three years ago and the room was small and the internet didn't work. So this time, since I needed this location, I chose a full suite and got a junior suite for my kids. Mine was lovely with a good-sized bath, comfy king bed, big closet, and a very nice chaise. The heat from the radiators was iffy but otherwise the room was quite nice. The junior suite was much smaller, tiny bathroom but very comfortable. The package we bought included gift certificates to Eli's down the street so I could even say that one of our breakfasts was included.
